title: Remove all 'recycling' wording and add Wada MIDC warehouse copy

requirements.text: Remove all occurrences of the word "recycling" from all public-facing marketing UI copy across the site (including Home, About, Trading, Contact pages, and shared layout components like the footer). Replace the affected sentences/headings with alternative wording that preserves meaning but does not use the word "recycling".

quotes: And remove all recycling word and add we have warehouse in wada midc

acceptanceCriteria: The rendered public pages (Home, About, Trading, Contact) contain zero instances of the word "recycling" (case-insensitive).
Shared components (e.g., footer/header) contain zero instances of the word "recycling" (case-insensitive).
No new UI copy introduces the word "recycling".

requirements.text: Add the exact sentence "We have a warehouse in Wada MIDC" to the public site content in a visible, appropriate location (at minimum on the Contact page contact information area; optionally also in the footer/company info if it improves consistency).

quotes: And remove all recycling word and add we have warehouse in wada midc

acceptanceCriteria: The Contact page displays the sentence "We have a warehouse in Wada MIDC" in English exactly as written.
The sentence is visible without requiring login and appears in a non-collapsed section of the page.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn/ui components are read-only).
Do not modify frontend immutable hook files (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Keep backend architecture as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not add or change authentication behavior.
Do not change inquiry submission backend schema or admin inquiry management features.
Do not add domain/email hosting functionality.
